Text:
I think that its a great idea to submit radiosnippets per subject/guest.
Maybe adding some few minutes of advertising in between from the Rense show would help Rense also.
Or you can include a html file with some links/ keywords from the programme together with some advertising banners from his show.

Anyway ,tnx for your efforts.

It's enough work to keep uploading torrents regularly like this though... I just get all of them - you soon know if it's not what you want.

Thx to upp'r
